message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is truly exceptional. It's worth more than $120 to us, and we're eager to share its benefits with you. For a limited time, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $150. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive guide on how to maximize its potential. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the full value of our product. Let me know if you have any questions or if you'd like to proceed with your purchase.
